long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple lightweight extension that removes the AI responses from Google and Bing search. Block Gemini or Copilot and go straight to viewing search results the old way. 

AI Responses can be useful, but currently there is no easy way to permanently turn them off for people who prefer search results the old way. 

Source Code: https://github.com/B-a-1-a/AIFreeSearch
